snippet.title: Life is Strange: Before the Storm Ep 2 Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/life-is-strange-before-the-storm-ps4/

Before the Storm: Episode 2 'Brave New World' releasing October 19 on PS4.

As Chloe and Rachel’s family life continues to crumble, their friendship blossoms and the two girls discuss running away together. But before they can go, Chloe gets involved with an errand for Frank Bowers which puts her in a dangerous situation and exposes an uglier side to Arcadia Bay…

Follow us on:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LifeIsStrangeGame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LifeIsStrange
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/lifeisstrangegame/
Tumblr: http://lifeisstrange-blog.tumblr.com/

www.lifeisstrange.com

Rated Mature: Sexual Themes, Strong Language, Use of Drugs and Alcohol, Violence
